name: Palace of the SR Trials
description:
A simple platformer. Climb up the Palace of the SR Trial. The first time will never be your fastest one.

New mechanics can be used to view a game from a different perspective.

Commands:
  • Arrow keys (left and right): move
  • Z key: jump / _o____ _u__  / w___ __m_
  • R key: restart
  • C key: toggle music
Credits:
  • Programming, Design and SFX made by me
  • Art made by PixelHole: https://pixelhole.itch.io/
  • Background Music made by TheDeadRat: https://thedeadrat.itch.io/

Game made for to the Quarantine Game Jam 2021 (in roughly 3 days), following the theme Speedrun. Hope you enjoy it (and feel free to share your best time).
